statements: UPDATE alerts SET description = 'New description' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE alerts SET timestamp = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE alerts SET description = 'New description', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_type = 'High Priority', customer_id = 101, timestamp = '2022-09-16 14:45:00' WHERE alert_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET balance = 1500 WHERE customer_id = '45e74d25-3c3d-4bd1-b2f1-23c78991e02d';
UPDATE alerts SET alert_type = 'New Alert', alert_message = 'Important update' WHERE customer_id = '45e74d25-3c3d-4bd1-b2f1-23c78991e02d';
UPDATE customers SET balance = 5000 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message = 'Payment due on 15th of the month' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_alerts SET alert_message = 'New message' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = 500.00, payment_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE payment_id = 10;
UPDATE customer_alerts SET alert_message = 'New important alert message' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE balances SET balance = balance - 100.00 WHERE customer_id = 10 AND account_type = 'Savings';

UPDATE alerts SET message = 'New message content' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET balance = balance - 100, account_status = 'Suspended' WHERE customer_id = 5;
